title: 5 AI innovations from 2024 that are genuinely helpful
description: 2024 was a big year for AI, and not all of it was good. But amidst the ethical dilemmas and growing concerns, many set out with the goal of harnessing the power of AI responsibly.
excerpt: An AI bot that wastes phone scammers' time? Count us in.
